seo.title: Portørtjenester i Positano
seo.description: Hvordan portørtjenester fungerer i Positano: hvor du bestiller, hva du kan forvente å betale og når de er mest nyttige.

intro: Porters help with heavy bags or mobility concerns. Arrange pickup at the dock or bus stop, confirm the rate first, and keep valuables with you.

sections.title: How it typically works
body: Arrange pickup point and time (dock or bus stop). Share your accommodation name and meeting time.
Agree the fee before moving. Prices vary by distance, stairs, and time of day.
Keep valuables with you; label your bags clearly.

sections.title: Booking & resources
body: Ask your accommodation for trusted local providers near the dock and main bus stops.
For storage or off‑hours options, see aggregators like Bounce / Radical Storage.

sections.title: Etiquette & tips
body: Tip for exceptional service or heavy loads; carry cash in small denominations.
Share your arrival plan in advance during peak periods to secure a slot.

a: Recommended if carrying heavy luggage; town has many stairs and steep lanes.
Ask your accommodation or local services near the main beach and bus stops.
Varies by distance and load; confirm rate before service begins.
